img_summary: The image depicts a dark and rocky landscape from a video game, with two characters visible. One character is crouched near a tree with glowing embers, while the other stands on a rocky path. A red arrow points to a higher rocky area, suggesting the direction the player should take. The environment is eerie, with barren trees and a misty atmosphere.
